00077 #define GET_CD_DATA(me, data) (me->edit_btmesh ? &me->edit_btmesh->bm->data : &me->data)
00078 static void delete_customdata_layer(bContext *C, Object *ob, CustomDataLayer *layer)
00079 {
00080     Mesh *me = ob->data;
00081     CustomData *data;
00082     void *actlayerdata, *rndlayerdata, *clonelayerdata, *stencillayerdata, *layerdata = layer->data;
00083     int type = layer->type;
00084     int index;
00085     int i, actindex, rndindex, cloneindex, stencilindex, tot;
00086 
00087     if (layer->type == CD_MLOOPCOL || layer->type == CD_MLOOPUV) {
00088         if (me->edit_btmesh) {
00089             data = &me->edit_btmesh->bm->ldata;
00090             tot = me->edit_btmesh->bm->totloop;
00091         }
00092         else {
00093             data = &me->ldata;
00094             tot = me->totloop;
00095         }
00096     }
00097     else {
00098         if (me->edit_btmesh) {
00099             data = &me->edit_btmesh->bm->pdata;
00100             tot = me->edit_btmesh->bm->totface;
00101         }
00102         else {
00103             data = &me->pdata;
00104             tot = me->totpoly;
00105         }
00106     }
00107     
00108     index = CustomData_get_layer_index(data, type);
00109 
00110     /* ok, deleting a non-active layer needs to preserve the active layer indices.
00111      * to do this, we store a pointer to the .data member of both layer and the active layer,
00112      * (to detect if we're deleting the active layer or not), then use the active
00113      * layer data pointer to find where the active layer has ended up.
00114      *
00115      * this is necessary because the deletion functions only support deleting the active
00116      * layer. */
00117     actlayerdata = data->layers[CustomData_get_active_layer_index(data, type)].data;
00118     rndlayerdata = data->layers[CustomData_get_render_layer_index(data, type)].data;
00119     clonelayerdata = data->layers[CustomData_get_clone_layer_index(data, type)].data;
00120     stencillayerdata = data->layers[CustomData_get_stencil_layer_index(data, type)].data;
00121     CustomData_set_layer_active(data, type, layer - &data->layers[index]);
00122 
00123     if (me->edit_btmesh) {
00124         BM_data_layer_free(me->edit_btmesh->bm, data, type);
00125     }
00126     else {
00127         CustomData_free_layer_active(data, type, tot);
00128         mesh_update_customdata_pointers(me, TRUE);
00129     }
00130 
00131     if (!CustomData_has_layer(data, type) && (type == CD_MLOOPCOL && (ob->mode & OB_MODE_VERTEX_PAINT)))
00132         ED_object_toggle_modes(C, OB_MODE_VERTEX_PAINT);
00133 
00134     /* reconstruct active layer */
00135     if (actlayerdata != layerdata) {
00136         /* find index */
00137         actindex = CustomData_get_layer_index(data, type);
00138         for (i = actindex; i < data->totlayer; i++) {
00139             if (data->layers[i].data == actlayerdata) {
00140                 actindex = i - actindex;
00141                 break;
00142             }
00143         }
00144         
00145         /* set index */
00146         CustomData_set_layer_active(data, type, actindex);
00147     }
00148     
00149     if (rndlayerdata != layerdata) {
00150         /* find index */
00151         rndindex = CustomData_get_layer_index(data, type);
00152         for (i = rndindex; i < data->totlayer; i++) {
00153             if (data->layers[i].data == rndlayerdata) {
00154                 rndindex = i - rndindex;
00155                 break;
00156             }
00157         }
00158         
00159         /* set index */
00160         CustomData_set_layer_render(data, type, rndindex);
00161     }
00162     
00163     if (clonelayerdata != layerdata) {
00164         /* find index */
00165         cloneindex = CustomData_get_layer_index(data, type);
00166         for (i = cloneindex; i < data->totlayer; i++) {
00167             if (data->layers[i].data == clonelayerdata) {
00168                 cloneindex = i - cloneindex;
00169                 break;
00170             }
00171         }
00172         
00173         /* set index */
00174         CustomData_set_layer_clone(data, type, cloneindex);
00175     }
00176     
00177     if (stencillayerdata != layerdata) {
00178         /* find index */
00179         stencilindex = CustomData_get_layer_index(data, type);
00180         for (i = stencilindex; i < data->totlayer; i++) {
00181             if (data->layers[i].data == stencillayerdata) {
00182                 stencilindex = i - stencilindex;
00183                 break;
00184             }
00185         }
00186         
00187         /* set index */
00188         CustomData_set_layer_stencil(data, type, stencilindex);
00189     }
00190 }
00191 
00192 /* copies from active to 'index' */
00193 static void editmesh_face_copy_customdata(BMEditMesh *em, int type, int index)
00194 {
00195     BMesh *bm = em->bm;
00196     CustomData *pdata = &bm->pdata;
00197     BMIter iter;
00198     BMFace *efa;
00199     const int n = CustomData_get_active_layer(pdata, type);
00200 
00201     /* ensure all current elements follow new customdata layout */
00202     BM_ITER_MESH (efa, &iter, bm, BM_FACES_OF_MESH) {
00203         void *data = CustomData_bmesh_get_n(pdata, efa->head.data, type, n);
00204         CustomData_bmesh_set_n(pdata, efa->head.data, type, index, data);
00205     }
00206 }
00207 
00208 /* copies from active to 'index' */
00209 static void editmesh_loop_copy_customdata(BMEditMesh *em, int type, int index)
00210 {
00211     BMesh *bm = em->bm;
00212     CustomData *ldata = &bm->ldata;
00213     BMIter iter;
00214     BMIter liter;
00215     BMFace *efa;
00216     BMLoop *loop;
00217     const int n = CustomData_get_active_layer(ldata, type);
00218 
00219     /* ensure all current elements follow new customdata layout */
00220     BM_ITER_MESH (efa, &iter, bm, BM_FACES_OF_MESH) {
00221         BM_ITER_ELEM (loop, &liter, efa, BM_LOOPS_OF_FACE) {
00222             void *data = CustomData_bmesh_get_n(ldata, loop->head.data, type, n);
00223             CustomData_bmesh_set_n(ldata, loop->head.data, type, index, data);
00224         }
00225     }
00226 }
00227 
00228 int ED_mesh_uv_loop_reset_ex(struct bContext *C, struct Mesh *me, const int layernum)
00229 {
00230     BMEditMesh *em = me->edit_btmesh;
00231     MLoopUV *luv;
00232     BLI_array_declare(polylengths);
00233     int *polylengths = NULL;
00234     BLI_array_declare(uvs);
00235     float **uvs = NULL;
00236     float **fuvs = NULL;
00237     int i, j;
00238 
00239     if (em) {
00240         /* Collect BMesh UVs */
00241 
00242         BMFace *efa;
00243         BMLoop *l;
00244         BMIter iter, liter;
00245 
00246         BLI_assert(CustomData_has_layer(&em->bm->ldata, CD_MLOOPUV));
00247 
00248         BM_ITER_MESH (efa, &iter, em->bm, BM_FACES_OF_MESH) {
00249             if (!BM_elem_flag_test(efa, BM_ELEM_SELECT))
00250                 continue;
00251 
00252             i = 0;
00253             BM_ITER_ELEM (l, &liter, efa, BM_LOOPS_OF_FACE) {
00254                 luv = CustomData_bmesh_get_n(&em->bm->ldata, l->head.data, CD_MLOOPUV, layernum);
00255                 BLI_array_append(uvs, luv->uv);
00256                 i++;
00257             }
00258 
00259             BLI_array_append(polylengths, efa->len);
00260         }
00261     }
00262     else {
00263         /* Collect Mesh UVs */
00264 
00265         MPoly *mp;
00266         MLoopUV *mloouv;
00267 
00268         BLI_assert(CustomData_has_layer(&me->ldata, CD_MLOOPUV));
00269         mloouv = CustomData_get_layer_n(&me->ldata, CD_MLOOPUV, layernum);
00270 
00271         for (j = 0; j < me->totpoly; j++) {
00272             mp = &me->mpoly[j];
00273 
00274             for (i = 0; i < mp->totloop; i++) {
00275                 luv = &mloouv[mp->loopstart + i];
00276                 BLI_array_append(uvs, luv->uv);
00277             }
00278 
00279             BLI_array_append(polylengths, mp->totloop);
00280         }
00281     }
00282 
00283     fuvs = uvs;
00284     for (j = 0; j < BLI_array_count(polylengths); j++) {
00285         int len = polylengths[j];
00286 
00287         if (len == 3) {
00288             fuvs[0][0] = 0.0;
00289             fuvs[0][1] = 0.0;
00290             
00291             fuvs[1][0] = 1.0;
00292             fuvs[1][1] = 0.0;
00293 
00294             fuvs[2][0] = 1.0;
00295             fuvs[2][1] = 1.0;
00296         }
00297         else if (len == 4) {
00298             fuvs[0][0] = 0.0;
00299             fuvs[0][1] = 0.0;
00300             
00301             fuvs[1][0] = 1.0;
00302             fuvs[1][1] = 0.0;
00303 
00304             fuvs[2][0] = 1.0;
00305             fuvs[2][1] = 1.0;
00306 
00307             fuvs[3][0] = 0.0;
00308             fuvs[3][1] = 1.0;
00309             /*make sure we ignore 2-sided faces*/
00310         }
00311         else if (len > 2) {
00312             float fac = 0.0f, dfac = 1.0f / (float)len;
00313 
00314             dfac *= M_PI * 2;
00315 
00316             for (i = 0; i < len; i++) {
00317                 fuvs[i][0] = 0.5f * sin(fac) + 0.5f;
00318                 fuvs[i][1] = 0.5f * cos(fac) + 0.5f;
00319 
00320                 fac += dfac;
00321             }
00322         }
00323 
00324         fuvs += len;
00325     }
00326 
00327     BLI_array_free(uvs);
00328     BLI_array_free(polylengths);
00329 
00330     DAG_id_tag_update(&me->id, 0);
00331     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_GEOM | ND_DATA, me);
00332 
00333     return 1;
00334 }
00335 
00336 int ED_mesh_uv_loop_reset(struct bContext *C, struct Mesh *me)
00337 {
00338     /* could be ldata or pdata */
00339     CustomData *pdata = GET_CD_DATA(me, pdata);
00340     const int layernum = CustomData_get_active_layer_index(pdata, CD_MTEXPOLY);
00341     return ED_mesh_uv_loop_reset_ex(C, me, layernum);
00342 }
00343 
00344 /* note: keep in sync with ED_mesh_color_add */
00345 int ED_mesh_uv_texture_add(bContext *C, Mesh *me, const char *name, int active_set)
00346 {
00347     BMEditMesh *em;
00348     int layernum;
00349 
00350     short is_init = FALSE;
00351 
00352     if (me->edit_btmesh) {
00353         em = me->edit_btmesh;
00354 
00355         layernum = CustomData_number_of_layers(&em->bm->pdata, CD_MTEXPOLY);
00356         if (layernum >= MAX_MTFACE)
00357             return -1;
00358 
00359         /* CD_MTEXPOLY */
00360         BM_data_layer_add_named(em->bm, &em->bm->pdata, CD_MTEXPOLY, name);
00361         /* copy data from active UV */
00362         if (layernum) {
00363             editmesh_face_copy_customdata(em, CD_MTEXPOLY, layernum);
00364         }
00365         if (active_set || layernum == 0) {
00366             CustomData_set_layer_active(&em->bm->pdata, CD_MTEXPOLY, layernum);
00367         }
00368 
00369         /* CD_MLOOPUV */
00370         BM_data_layer_add_named(em->bm, &em->bm->ldata, CD_MLOOPUV, name);
00371         /* copy data from active UV */
00372         if (layernum) {
00373             editmesh_loop_copy_customdata(em, CD_MLOOPUV, layernum);
00374             is_init = TRUE;
00375         }
00376         if (active_set || layernum == 0) {
00377             CustomData_set_layer_active(&em->bm->ldata, CD_MLOOPUV, layernum);
00378         }
00379     }
00380     else {
00381         layernum = CustomData_number_of_layers(&me->pdata, CD_MTEXPOLY);
00382         if (layernum >= MAX_MTFACE)
00383             return -1;
00384 
00385         if (me->mtpoly) {
00386             CustomData_add_layer_named(&me->pdata, CD_MTEXPOLY, CD_DUPLICATE, me->mtpoly, me->totpoly, name);
00387             CustomData_add_layer_named(&me->ldata, CD_MLOOPUV, CD_DUPLICATE, me->mloopuv, me->totloop, name);
00388             CustomData_add_layer_named(&me->fdata, CD_MTFACE, CD_DUPLICATE, me->mtface, me->totface, name);
00389             is_init = TRUE;
00390         }
00391         else {
00392             CustomData_add_layer_named(&me->pdata, CD_MTEXPOLY, CD_DEFAULT, NULL, me->totpoly, name);
00393             CustomData_add_layer_named(&me->ldata, CD_MLOOPUV, CD_DEFAULT, NULL, me->totloop, name);
00394             CustomData_add_layer_named(&me->fdata, CD_MTFACE, CD_DEFAULT, NULL, me->totface, name);
00395         }
00396         
00397         if (active_set || layernum == 0) {
00398             CustomData_set_layer_active(&me->pdata, CD_MTEXPOLY, layernum);
00399             CustomData_set_layer_active(&me->ldata, CD_MLOOPUV, layernum);
00400 
00401             CustomData_set_layer_active(&me->fdata, CD_MTFACE, layernum);
00402         }
00403 
00404         mesh_update_customdata_pointers(me, TRUE);
00405     }
00406 
00407     /* don't overwrite our copied coords */
00408     if (is_init == FALSE) {
00409         ED_mesh_uv_loop_reset_ex(C, me, layernum);
00410     }
00411 
00412     DAG_id_tag_update(&me->id, 0);
00413     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_GEOM | ND_DATA, me);
00414 
00415     return layernum;
00416 }
00417 
00418 int ED_mesh_uv_texture_remove(bContext *C, Object *ob, Mesh *me)
00419 {
00420     CustomData *pdata = GET_CD_DATA(me, pdata), *ldata = GET_CD_DATA(me, ldata);
00421     CustomDataLayer *cdlp, *cdlu;
00422     int index;
00423 
00424     index = CustomData_get_active_layer_index(pdata, CD_MTEXPOLY);
00425     cdlp = (index == -1) ? NULL : &pdata->layers[index];
00426 
00427     index = CustomData_get_active_layer_index(ldata, CD_MLOOPUV);
00428     cdlu = (index == -1) ? NULL : &ldata->layers[index];
00429     
00430     if (!cdlp || !cdlu)
00431         return 0;
00432 
00433     delete_customdata_layer(C, ob, cdlp);
00434     delete_customdata_layer(C, ob, cdlu);
00435     
00436     DAG_id_tag_update(&me->id, 0);
00437     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_GEOM | ND_DATA, me);
00438 
00439     return 1;
00440 }
00441 
00442 /* note: keep in sync with ED_mesh_uv_texture_add */
00443 int ED_mesh_color_add(bContext *C, Scene *UNUSED(scene), Object *UNUSED(ob), Mesh *me, const char *name, int active_set)
00444 {
00445     BMEditMesh *em;
00446     int layernum;
00447 
00448     if (me->edit_btmesh) {
00449         em = me->edit_btmesh;
00450 
00451         layernum = CustomData_number_of_layers(&em->bm->ldata, CD_MLOOPCOL);
00452         if (layernum >= MAX_MCOL) {
00453             return -1;
00454         }
00455 
00456         /* CD_MLOOPCOL */
00457         BM_data_layer_add_named(em->bm, &em->bm->ldata, CD_MLOOPCOL, name);
00458         /* copy data from active vertex color layer */
00459         if (layernum) {
00460             editmesh_loop_copy_customdata(em, CD_MLOOPCOL, layernum);
00461         }
00462         if (active_set || layernum == 0) {
00463             CustomData_set_layer_active(&em->bm->ldata, CD_MLOOPCOL, layernum);
00464         }
00465     }
00466     else {
00467         layernum = CustomData_number_of_layers(&me->ldata, CD_MLOOPCOL);
00468         if (layernum >= CD_MLOOPCOL) {
00469             return -1;
00470         }
00471 
00472         if (me->mloopcol) {
00473             CustomData_add_layer_named(&me->ldata, CD_MLOOPCOL, CD_DUPLICATE, me->mloopcol, me->totloop, name);
00474             CustomData_add_layer_named(&me->fdata, CD_MCOL, CD_DUPLICATE, me->mcol, me->totface, name);
00475         }
00476         else {
00477             CustomData_add_layer_named(&me->ldata, CD_MLOOPCOL, CD_DEFAULT, NULL, me->totloop, name);
00478             CustomData_add_layer_named(&me->fdata, CD_MCOL, CD_DEFAULT, NULL, me->totface, name);
00479         }
00480 
00481         if (active_set || layernum == 0) {
00482             CustomData_set_layer_active(&me->ldata, CD_MLOOPCOL, layernum);
00483             CustomData_set_layer_active(&me->fdata, CD_MCOL, layernum);
00484         }
00485 
00486         mesh_update_customdata_pointers(me, TRUE);
00487     }
00488 
00489     DAG_id_tag_update(&me->id, 0);
00490     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_GEOM | ND_DATA, me);
00491 
00492     return layernum;
00493 }
00494 
00495 int ED_mesh_color_remove(bContext *C, Object *ob, Mesh *me)
00496 {
00497     CustomData *ldata = GET_CD_DATA(me, ldata);
00498     CustomDataLayer *cdl;
00499     int index;
00500 
00501     index = CustomData_get_active_layer_index(ldata, CD_MLOOPCOL);
00502     cdl = (index == -1) ? NULL : &ldata->layers[index];
00503 
00504     if (!cdl)
00505         return 0;
00506 
00507     delete_customdata_layer(C, ob, cdl);
00508     DAG_id_tag_update(&me->id, 0);
00509     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_GEOM | ND_DATA, me);
00510 
00511     return 1;
00512 }
00513 
00514 int ED_mesh_color_remove_named(bContext *C, Object *ob, Mesh *me, const char *name)
00515 {
00516     CustomData *ldata = GET_CD_DATA(me, ldata);
00517     CustomDataLayer *cdl;
00518     int index;
00519 
00520     index = CustomData_get_named_layer_index(ldata, CD_MLOOPCOL, name);
00521     cdl = (index == -1) ? NULL : &ldata->layers[index];
00522 
00523     if (!cdl)
00524         return 0;
00525 
00526     delete_customdata_layer(C, ob, cdl);
00527     DAG_id_tag_update(&me->id, 0);
00528     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_GEOM | ND_DATA, me);
00529 
00530     return 1;
00531 }

00533 /*********************** UV texture operators ************************/
00534 
00535 static int layers_poll(bContext *C)
00536 {
00537     Object *ob = ED_object_context(C);
00538     ID *data = (ob) ? ob->data : NULL;
00539     return (ob && !ob->id.lib && ob->type == OB_MESH && data && !data->lib);
00540 }
00541 
00542 static int mesh_uv_texture_add_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *UNUSED(op))
00543 {
00544     Object *ob = ED_object_context(C);
00545     Mesh *me = ob->data;
00546 
00547     if (ED_mesh_uv_texture_add(C, me, NULL, TRUE) == -1)
00548         return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
00549 
00550     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
00551 }
00552 
00553 void MESH_OT_uv_texture_add(wmOperatorType *ot)
00554 {
00555     /* identifiers */
00556     ot->name = "Add UV Map";
00557     ot->description = "Add UV Map";
00558     ot->idname = "MESH_OT_uv_texture_add";
00559     
00560     /* api callbacks */
00561     ot->poll = layers_poll;
00562     ot->exec = mesh_uv_texture_add_exec;
00563 
00564     /* flags */
00565     ot->flag = OPTYPE_REGISTER | OPTYPE_UNDO;
00566 }
00567 
00568 static int drop_named_image_invoke(bContext *C, wmOperator *op, wmEvent *event)
00569 {
00570     Main *bmain = CTX_data_main(C);
00571     Scene *scene = CTX_data_scene(C);
00572     View3D *v3d = CTX_wm_view3d(C);
00573     Base *base = ED_view3d_give_base_under_cursor(C, event->mval);
00574     Image *ima = NULL;
00575     Mesh *me;
00576     Object *obedit;
00577     int exitmode = 0;
00578     char name[MAX_ID_NAME - 2];
00579     
00580     /* Check context */
00581     if (base == NULL || base->object->type != OB_MESH) {
00582         BKE_report(op->reports, RPT_ERROR, "Not an Object or Mesh");
00583         return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
00584     }
00585     
00586     /* check input variables */
00587     if (RNA_struct_property_is_set(op->ptr, "filepath")) {
00588         char path[FILE_MAX];
00589         
00590         RNA_string_get(op->ptr, "filepath", path);
00591         ima = BKE_add_image_file(path);
00592     }
00593     else {
00594         RNA_string_get(op->ptr, "name", name);
00595         ima = (Image *)find_id("IM", name);
00596     }
00597     
00598     if (!ima) {
00599         BKE_report(op->reports, RPT_ERROR, "Not an Image");
00600         return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
00601     }
00602     
00603     /* put mesh in editmode */
00604 
00605     obedit = base->object;
00606     me = obedit->data;
00607     if (me->edit_btmesh == NULL) {
00608         EDBM_mesh_make(scene->toolsettings, scene, obedit);
00609         exitmode = 1;
00610     }
00611     if (me->edit_btmesh == NULL)
00612         return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
00613     
00614     ED_uvedit_assign_image(bmain, scene, obedit, ima, NULL);
00615 
00616     if (exitmode) {
00617         EDBM_mesh_load(obedit);
00618         EDBM_mesh_free(me->edit_btmesh);
00619         MEM_freeN(me->edit_btmesh);
00620         me->edit_btmesh = NULL;
00621 
00622         /* load_editMesh free's pointers used by CustomData layers which might be used by DerivedMesh too,
00623          * so signal to re-create DerivedMesh here (sergey) */
00624         DAG_id_tag_update(&me->id, 0);
00625     }
00626 
00627     /* dummie drop support; ensure view shows a result :) */
00628     if (v3d)
00629         v3d->flag2 |= V3D_SOLID_TEX;
00630     
00631     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_GEOM | ND_DATA, obedit->data);
00632     
00633     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
00634 }
00635

00639     ot->name = "Assign Image to UV Map";
00640     ot->description = "Assign Image to active UV Map, or create an UV Map";
00641     ot->idname = "MESH_OT_drop_named_image";
00642     
00643     /* api callbacks */
00644     ot->poll = layers_poll;
00645     ot->invoke = drop_named_image_invoke;
00646     
00647     /* flags */
00648     ot->flag = OPTYPE_UNDO;
00649     
00650     /* properties */
00651     RNA_def_string(ot->srna, "name", "Image", MAX_ID_NAME - 2, "Name", "Image name to assign");
00652     RNA_def_string(ot->srna, "filepath", "Path", FILE_MAX, "Filepath", "Path to image file");
00653 }

00774 static int mesh_sticky_remove_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *UNUSED(op))
00775 {
00776     Object *ob = ED_object_context(C);
00777     Mesh *me = ob->data;
00778 
00779     if (!me->msticky)
00780         return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
00781 
00782     CustomData_free_layer_active(&me->vdata, CD_MSTICKY, me->totvert);
00783     me->msticky = NULL;
00784 
00785     DAG_id_tag_update(&me->id, 0);
00786     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_GEOM | ND_DATA, me);
00787 
00788     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
00789 }

00805 
00806 /************************** Add Geometry Layers *************************/
00807 
00808 void ED_mesh_update(Mesh *mesh, bContext *C, int calc_edges, int calc_tessface)
00809 {
00810     int *polyindex = NULL;
00811     float (*face_nors)[3];
00812     int tessface_input = FALSE;
00813 
00814     if (mesh->totface > 0 && mesh->totpoly == 0) {
00815         BKE_mesh_convert_mfaces_to_mpolys(mesh);
00816 
00817         /* would only be converting back again, don't bother */
00818         tessface_input = TRUE;
00819     }
00820 
00821     if (calc_edges || ((mesh->totpoly || mesh->totface) && mesh->totedge == 0))
00822         BKE_mesh_calc_edges(mesh, calc_edges);
00823 
00824     if (calc_tessface) {
00825         if (tessface_input == FALSE) {
00826             BKE_mesh_tessface_calc(mesh);
00827         }
00828     }
00829     else {
00830         /* default state is not to have tessface's so make sure this is the case */
00831         BKE_mesh_tessface_clear(mesh);
00832     }
00833 
00834     /* note on this if/else - looks like these layers are not needed
00835      * so rather then add poly-index layer and calculate normals for it
00836      * calculate normals only for the mvert's. - campbell */
00837 #ifdef USE_BMESH_MPOLY_NORMALS
00838     polyindex = CustomData_get_layer(&mesh->fdata, CD_POLYINDEX);
00839     /* add a normals layer for tessellated faces, a tessface normal will
00840      * contain the normal of the poly the face was tessellated from. */
00841     face_nors = CustomData_add_layer(&mesh->fdata, CD_NORMAL, CD_CALLOC, NULL, mesh->totface);
00842 
00843     mesh_calc_normals_mapping_ex(mesh->mvert, mesh->totvert,
00844                                  mesh->mloop, mesh->mpoly,
00845                                  mesh->totloop, mesh->totpoly,
00846                                  NULL /* polyNors_r */,
00847                                  mesh->mface, mesh->totface,
00848                                  polyindex, face_nors, FALSE);
00849 #else
00850     mesh_calc_normals(mesh->mvert, mesh->totvert,
00851                       mesh->mloop, mesh->mpoly, mesh->totloop, mesh->totpoly,
00852                       NULL);
00853     (void)polyindex;
00854     (void)face_nors;
00855 #endif
00856 
00857     DAG_id_tag_update(&mesh->id, 0);
00858     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_GEOM | ND_DATA, mesh);
00859 }
00860 
00861 static void mesh_add_verts(Mesh *mesh, int len)
00862 {
00863     CustomData vdata;
00864     MVert *mvert;
00865     int i, totvert;
00866 
00867     if (len == 0)
00868         return;
00869 
00870     totvert = mesh->totvert + len;
00871     CustomData_copy(&mesh->vdata, &vdata, CD_MASK_MESH, CD_DEFAULT, totvert);
00872     CustomData_copy_data(&mesh->vdata, &vdata, 0, 0, mesh->totvert);
00873 
00874     if (!CustomData_has_layer(&vdata, CD_MVERT))
00875         CustomData_add_layer(&vdata, CD_MVERT, CD_CALLOC, NULL, totvert);
00876 
00877     CustomData_free(&mesh->vdata, mesh->totvert);
00878     mesh->vdata = vdata;
00879     mesh_update_customdata_pointers(mesh, FALSE);
00880 
00881     /* scan the input list and insert the new vertices */
00882 
00883     mvert = &mesh->mvert[mesh->totvert];
00884     for (i = 0; i < len; i++, mvert++)
00885         mvert->flag |= SELECT;
00886 
00887     /* set final vertex list size */
00888     mesh->totvert = totvert;
00889 }
00890 
00891 void ED_mesh_transform(Mesh *me, float *mat)
00892 {
00893     int i;
00894     MVert *mvert = me->mvert;
00895 
00896     for (i = 0; i < me->totvert; i++, mvert++)
00897         mul_m4_v3((float (*)[4])mat, mvert->co);
00898 
00899     /* don't update normals, caller can do this explicitly */
00900 }
00901 
00902 static void mesh_add_edges(Mesh *mesh, int len)
00903 {
00904     CustomData edata;
00905     MEdge *medge;
00906     int i, totedge;
00907 
00908     if (len == 0)
00909         return;
00910 
00911     totedge = mesh->totedge + len;
00912 
00913     /* update customdata  */
00914     CustomData_copy(&mesh->edata, &edata, CD_MASK_MESH, CD_DEFAULT, totedge);
00915     CustomData_copy_data(&mesh->edata, &edata, 0, 0, mesh->totedge);
00916 
00917     if (!CustomData_has_layer(&edata, CD_MEDGE))
00918         CustomData_add_layer(&edata, CD_MEDGE, CD_CALLOC, NULL, totedge);
00919 
00920     CustomData_free(&mesh->edata, mesh->totedge);
00921     mesh->edata = edata;
00922     mesh_update_customdata_pointers(mesh, FALSE); /* new edges don't change tessellation */
00923 
00924     /* set default flags */
00925     medge = &mesh->medge[mesh->totedge];
00926     for (i = 0; i < len; i++, medge++)
00927         medge->flag = ME_EDGEDRAW | ME_EDGERENDER | SELECT;
00928 
00929     mesh->totedge = totedge;
00930 }
00931 
00932 static void mesh_add_tessfaces(Mesh *mesh, int len)
00933 {
00934     CustomData fdata;
00935     MFace *mface;
00936     int i, totface;
00937 
00938     if (len == 0)
00939         return;
00940 
00941     totface = mesh->totface + len;   /* new face count */
00942 
00943     /* update customdata */
00944     CustomData_copy(&mesh->fdata, &fdata, CD_MASK_MESH, CD_DEFAULT, totface);
00945     CustomData_copy_data(&mesh->fdata, &fdata, 0, 0, mesh->totface);
00946 
00947     if (!CustomData_has_layer(&fdata, CD_MFACE))
00948         CustomData_add_layer(&fdata, CD_MFACE, CD_CALLOC, NULL, totface);
00949 
00950     CustomData_free(&mesh->fdata, mesh->totface);
00951     mesh->fdata = fdata;
00952     mesh_update_customdata_pointers(mesh, TRUE);
00953 
00954     /* set default flags */
00955     mface = &mesh->mface[mesh->totface];
00956     for (i = 0; i < len; i++, mface++)
00957         mface->flag = ME_FACE_SEL;
00958 
00959     mesh->totface = totface;
00960 }
00961 
00962 static void mesh_add_loops(Mesh *mesh, int len)
00963 {
00964     CustomData ldata;
00965     int totloop;
00966 
00967     if (len == 0)
00968         return;
00969 
00970     totloop = mesh->totloop + len;   /* new face count */
00971 
00972     /* update customdata */
00973     CustomData_copy(&mesh->ldata, &ldata, CD_MASK_MESH, CD_DEFAULT, totloop);
00974     CustomData_copy_data(&mesh->ldata, &ldata, 0, 0, mesh->totloop);
00975 
00976     if (!CustomData_has_layer(&ldata, CD_MLOOP))
00977         CustomData_add_layer(&ldata, CD_MLOOP, CD_CALLOC, NULL, totloop);
00978 
00979     CustomData_free(&mesh->ldata, mesh->totloop);
00980     mesh->ldata = ldata;
00981     mesh_update_customdata_pointers(mesh, TRUE);
00982 
00983     mesh->totloop = totloop;
00984 }
00985 
00986 static void mesh_add_polys(Mesh *mesh, int len)
00987 {
00988     CustomData pdata;
00989     MPoly *mpoly;
00990     int i, totpoly;
00991 
00992     if (len == 0)
00993         return;
00994 
00995     totpoly = mesh->totpoly + len;   /* new face count */
00996 
00997     /* update customdata */
00998     CustomData_copy(&mesh->pdata, &pdata, CD_MASK_MESH, CD_DEFAULT, totpoly);
00999     CustomData_copy_data(&mesh->pdata, &pdata, 0, 0, mesh->totpoly);
01000 
01001     if (!CustomData_has_layer(&pdata, CD_MPOLY))
01002         CustomData_add_layer(&pdata, CD_MPOLY, CD_CALLOC, NULL, totpoly);
01003 
01004     CustomData_free(&mesh->pdata, mesh->totpoly);
01005     mesh->pdata = pdata;
01006     mesh_update_customdata_pointers(mesh, TRUE);
01007 
01008     /* set default flags */
01009     mpoly = &mesh->mpoly[mesh->totpoly];
01010     for (i = 0; i < len; i++, mpoly++)
01011         mpoly->flag = ME_FACE_SEL;
01012 
01013     mesh->totpoly = totpoly;
01014 }
01015 
01016 static void mesh_remove_verts(Mesh *mesh, int len)
01017 {
01018     int totvert;
01019 
01020     if (len == 0)
01021         return;
01022 
01023     totvert = mesh->totvert - len;
01024     CustomData_free_elem(&mesh->vdata, totvert, len);
01025 
01026     /* set final vertex list size */
01027     mesh->totvert = totvert;
01028 }
01029 
01030 static void mesh_remove_edges(Mesh *mesh, int len)
01031 {
01032     int totedge;
01033 
01034     if (len == 0)
01035         return;
01036 
01037     totedge = mesh->totedge - len;
01038     CustomData_free_elem(&mesh->edata, totedge, len);
01039 
01040     mesh->totedge = totedge;
01041 }
01042 
01043 static void mesh_remove_faces(Mesh *mesh, int len)
01044 {
01045     int totface;
01046 
01047     if (len == 0)
01048         return;
01049 
01050     totface = mesh->totface - len;   /* new face count */
01051     CustomData_free_elem(&mesh->fdata, totface, len);
01052 
01053     mesh->totface = totface;
01054 }

01073 void ED_mesh_tessfaces_add(Mesh *mesh, ReportList *reports, int count)
01074 {
01075     if (mesh->edit_btmesh) {
01076         BKE_report(reports, RPT_ERROR, "Can't add tessfaces in edit mode");
01077         return;
01078     }
01079 
01080     if (mesh->mpoly) {
01081         BKE_report(reports, RPT_ERROR, "Can't add tessfaces to a mesh that already has polygons");
01082         return;
01083     }
01084 
01085     mesh_add_tessfaces(mesh, count);
01086 }

01108 void ED_mesh_faces_remove(Mesh *mesh, ReportList *reports, int count)
01109 {
01110     if (mesh->edit_btmesh) {
01111         BKE_report(reports, RPT_ERROR, "Can't remove faces in edit mode");
01112         return;
01113     }
01114     else if (count > mesh->totface) {
01115         BKE_report(reports, RPT_ERROR, "Can't remove more faces than the mesh contains");
01116         return;
01117     }
01118 
01119     mesh_remove_faces(mesh, count);
01120 }

01122 void ED_mesh_edges_remove(Mesh *mesh, ReportList *reports, int count)
01123 {

01125         BKE_report(reports, RPT_ERROR, "Can't remove edges in edit mode");
01126         return;
01127     }
01128     else if (count > mesh->totedge) {
01129         BKE_report(reports, RPT_ERROR, "Can't remove more edges than the mesh contains");
01130         return;
01131     }
01132 
01133     mesh_remove_edges(mesh, count);
01134 }

01136 void ED_mesh_vertices_remove(Mesh *mesh, ReportList *reports, int count)

01144         return;

01170 void ED_mesh_calc_normals(Mesh *mesh)
01171 {
01172 #ifdef USE_BMESH_MPOLY_NORMALS
01173     mesh_calc_normals_mapping_ex(mesh->mvert, mesh->totvert,
01174                                  mesh->mloop, mesh->mpoly, mesh->totloop, mesh->totpoly,
01175                                  NULL, NULL, 0, NULL, NULL, FALSE);
01176 #else
01177     mesh_calc_normals(mesh->mvert, mesh->totvert,
01178                       mesh->mloop, mesh->mpoly, mesh->totloop, mesh->totpoly,
01179                       NULL);
01180 #endif
01181 }
01182 
01183 void ED_mesh_calc_tessface(Mesh *mesh)
01184 {
01185     if (mesh->edit_btmesh) {
01186         BMEdit_RecalcTessellation(mesh->edit_btmesh);
01187     }
01188     else {
01189         BKE_mesh_tessface_calc(mesh);
01190     }
01191 }
